license.notes: EPL-2.0 / EDL-1.0 dual. Study-only for CIF extraction: the broker config/ACL model defines how MQTT topics and clients are structured. Portarium uses Mosquitto as a deployment dependency (not vendored into core).

extraction.notes: Extract entity model from mosquitto.conf documented options and the C header. Entities: BrokerConfig, Listener, Client, Topic, ACLEntry, Bridge, TLSConfig. Actions: publish, subscribe, connect, disconnect.
